contentList.content: Attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="MonkWeapon">Monk Weapons</LSTag> and unarmed attacks deal [1], unless their normal damage is higher.
You can make <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Target_OneDnD_BonusUnarmedStrike">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Swiftly strike a target with your bare fists as an action.
Swiftly strike a target with your bare fists as a bonus action.
